hba1c.description: HbA1c measurement; in the format X.X, either hba1c or tracker should be provided (or both).

tracker.description: Glucose tracker name; predefined or custom tracker name (matches tracker name on the website, e.g. 'Afternoon')

glucose.description: Glucose measurement; in the format X.X, required with tracker parameter, otherwise optional.

date.description: Measurement date; in the format yyyy-MM-dd.

time.description: Time of the measurement; hours and minutes in the format HH:mm.
